Text:
Thank you once again for doing this.

Do you know if anyone has a "discography" of Kenny Marks, Morgan Cryar and David Meece perhaps? I have it all on tapes, and as it would be, I don't have a tape player. Don't laugh, I know I'm giving away my age.

Thanks again! 

I would love to have a discography of Bryan Duncan, Allies and Sweet Comfort Band if you have them.  Big fan of the oldies!
Many thankx....i see jonathan butler's album. Awesome!!
Clloud, I've got a decent amount of both David Meece and Kenny Marks, but only a couple albums for Morgan Cryar.  Just the same, I'll work on all three discographies for you.  :)

Phaedron, please do a search on both "Bryan Duncan" and "Sweet Comfort Band."  I've already shared discographies for both.  I will work on one for "Allies" for you, and Lord willing, it will be available for you within the next day or so.
Clloud and Phaedron, your discographies are now being shared.  :)
